00030         {

00036                 
00037                 if(count($matches[0])==0)
00038                         return $text;
00039                 
00040

00042

00044                         $position = strpos($text, $matches[0][$i]);
00045                         $address[] = $matches[1][$i];

00047                         $text = substr_replace($text, $div, $position, strlen($matches[0][$i]));
00048                 }

00050                 $STARTSCRIPTS.="googlemaps_initialize();";
